data.title: Did Jennifer Lopez get married to Marc Anthony or whomever?
data.meta_description: Some of the guys here in my office were crying in the corner and I asked them what their problem was... they said JLo got married to some guy in some secret...

I don't watch TV so I haven't heard anything. Is this true?
